title: The week in tennis: Gauff wins WTA Finals title, while underdogs rule in last ATP events
description: Gauff capped her year with the WTA Finals trophy, while two unexpected champions won titles and Medvedev had an epic meltdown.
author: D'Arcy Maine

title: The week in tennis: Zverev wins in Paris, and the ATP Finals spots are locked in
description: With Djokovic out, the last three ATP Finals spots have been determined, while Zverev had a big victory in France this week.
author: D'Arcy Maine

title: 3 Djokovic Secrets To Winning More Matches - Essential Tennis Podcast #414
description: In this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast, you're going to learn the top 3 tactical secrets of Novak Djokovic that you can apply in your very next match. Use these tools to gain precision, consistency, and offense to make your opponents more uncomfortable, win more points, and win more matches.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: 13 Ways to DESTROY Your Tennis Competition (Legally) - Essential Tennis Podcast #413
description: If you love tennis and want to perform your best in competition so you can win many more matches than ever before, then this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast is exactly for you. You're about to learn the top 13 ways that you can instantly improve your competitive results through highly practical and actionable tips and tricks related to strategy, mindset, technique, and the mental game. Let’s start winning more tennis matches NOW!
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: Sinner beats Fritz after Medvedev defeats De Minaur
description: Jannik Sinner beats Taylor Fritz 6-4 6-4 while Daniil Medvedev defeats Alex de Minaur 6-2 6-4 at the ATP Tour Finals.

title: Ruud stuns out-of-sorts Alcaraz at ATP Finals
description: Casper Ruud stuns an out-of-sorts Carlos Alcaraz at the ATP Finals, before Alexander Zverev beats Andrey Rublev.

title: ATP Finals 2024 Day Three Recap
description: On day three of the 2024 Nitto ATP Finals, Daniil Medvedev kept his semi-final hopes alive with a 6-2 6-4 victory over Alex de Minaur in the day session. Meddy came into the tie after a flat performance against Taylor Fritz, during which he looked ready for the off-season, but he played with much more …
author: Jonathan

title: ATP Finals 2024 Day Two Recap
description: Day two at the 2024 Nitto ATP finals kicked off with a surprise as Casper Ruud ended his losing streak by defeating Carlos Alcaraz 6-1 7-5 in the afternoon session in Turin. Ruud has only won one of his last seven tour matches and failed to advance past the first round in his previous three …
author: Jonathan

title: Ruud’s stunning lob vs. Alcaraz… As you’ve never seen it before!
description: Even hardcore fans who have been keeping a keen eye on every point of the Nitto ATP Finals action this week in Turin have never seen tennis like this… At the 2024 edition of the prestigious season finale, some of the most memorable on-court moments produced by the ATP Tour’s finest stars in Turin will be presented to help attract a younger audience and create new tennis fans. Each day, a Nitto ATP Finals Immersive Highlight will showcase a great point using cutting edge AR technology, 3D modelling and live data, bringing ATP tennis into people’s lives in a new and innovative way. Check out Ruud’s stunning lob below to experience tennis like never before! [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: What is the Nitto ATP Finals schedule for Wednesday & Thursday?
description: Each Nitto ATP Finals competitor will return to Turin’s Inalpi Arena on Wednesday and Thursday for another taste of the action at the prestigious season finale. Here is the schedule for the next two days at the Nitto ATP Finals. [ATP APP] ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 13, 2024 CENTRE COURT start 11:30 am [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs [6] Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Matthew Ebden (AUS) Not Before 2:00 pm [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs [8] Andrey Rublev Not Before 6:00 pm [4] Simone Bolelli (ITA) / Andrea Vavassori (ITA) vs [8] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) Not Before 8:30 pm [2] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs [6] Casper Ruud (NOR) Read Preview: Alcaraz & Rublev meet again in Turin ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, NOVEMBER 14, 2024 CENTRE COURT start 11:30 am [3] Wesley Koolhof (NED) / Nikola Mektic (CRO) vs [7] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) Henry Patten (GBR) Not Before 2:00 pm [5] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs [7] Alex de Minaur (AUS) Not Before 6:00 pm [2] Marcel Granollers (ESP) /Horacio Zeballos (ARG) / [5] Max Purcell (AUS) / Jordan Thompson (AUS) Not Before 8:30 pm [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) / [4] Daniil Medvedev [NEWSLETTER FORM]
